thumb.title: Furina ❤️ Skirk ❤️ Citlali -『ミッドサマーシトラス-ReGLOSS』何気ない1日が【 Motion DL 】
thumb.description: Hey! Thanks for checking out my MMD motions 💃 I'm creating using QuickMagicAI and distributing .vmd motion data (including cam motions) on Ko-fi to support my work.Follow along to get free motion every weekend.Please note that this motion is free to download for a limited time only.Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@BerserkiKun/joinKo-Fi Shop - https://ko-fi.com/BerserkiKun/shopMembers-only playlist: ️️️https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOZJhl3SU3xdbT_eIztwjc4QCredits:Motion: @BerserkiKunMotion DL: Go to Ko-fi shopModel: Hoyoverse/MihoyoMeet with BerserkiKun:Twitter/X: https://x.com/BerserkiKunTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/BerserkiKunDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/2Ruu5hKQEEHoyoLab: https://www.hoyolab.com/accountCenter/postList?id=221567617Facebook: https://facebook.com/BerserkiKun
